title: Watermelon Tomato Salad With Balsamic Dressing

Ingredients.2: 1 large ripe tomato, peeled and diced

Ingredients.7: 2 (1 gram) packets saccharine-based sugar substitute (such as Sweet'N Low®)

Ingredients.8: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Place watermelon cubes, tomato, sweet onion, and green onion into a salad bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk together the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, and sweetener until the sweetener has dissolved. Pour the dressing over the salad, and lightly toss; sprinkle with salt and black pepper to taste.

Directions.2: Refrigerate at least 30 minutes before serving.
